module.name: imuFilter
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: This module applies filtering to remove gyro bias. \n At startup an attempt is made to connect to the IMU port of the specified robot.

param.desc: module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name.
name of the robot to connect to.
Order of the median filter for the gyro data.
Order of the median filter for the magnetometer data.
Magnetic field up-threshold for stopping bias adaption.
Magnetic field down-threshold for starting bias adaption.

input.description: receive from the robot the 12 double containing imu data.

output.description: provide the current estimate of the gyro bias.
